moves.1. e4: Here is one of my best games playing as black. I feel I executed very well this game. Feel free to comment.
moves.1... c6: Not how I normally counter against e4. But I have been doing a little research on chess openings, and want to try some different things.
moves.3. e5 e6: This was not a strong move for me. Bf5 would have been better.
moves.4. Nc3 Ne7 5. Nf3 Nf5 6. g3 h6 7. Bg2 Qc: Beginning to push my pawns against the O-O-O.
I feel very confident at this point. Na3 was not a good move. Bb4 capturing my Knight would have been the best move.
moves.16... Na2+ 17. Kd2: That pesky Bishop on c3 is going to be my biggest problem right now.
moves.17... Bb4: Hoping he takes my bishop trade . If he does the game is over.
moves.18. Bxb4: And I smile when I see this I knew that I had the win.
moves.18... Qxb4+ 19. c3 Qxb2+ 20. Nc2 Qxc3#: Probably one of my best games to date.
